Name: Eclipse Horde
About the game: 'Craft or die' It's up to you to decide. Your streaming is always welcome! Let's survive in zombie world! You can cut trees and mine ores, plow the field, craft items. For example, you can do the following. * Pick a stone to craft a stone knife. * Cut trees with a stone knife. * Craft a stone pickaxe from stones and wood. * Mine iron rocks to get iron ore and craft iron ingots by a forge. * Craft iron axes of iron ingots. * Beat zombies by iron axe. * Use iron bucket to get seawater then craft a clean water from seawater. You can craft salt from seawater too. * Plow the field and sow seeds. After you water the plants, you can get crops. * Dig the ground to set wood spikes to protect from zombies. * Play the billiards with friendly NPCs. * Attack the NPC to loot their items. * Lets fishing!
